channel.title: Compiling Error
channel.description:
Hello, Im getting this error when I compile my server. First thing, here is a post of the compiler im using:
[code] @echo off color 0 title _____ javac *.java pause [/code] This is the error I get when compiling: [code] javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options press any key to continue. . . [/code]
Any help is greatly appreciated, I have never had this problem before.

item.title: Compiling Error
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Legend God Of Legend
item.description:
@God_Of_Legend wrote:

Hello, Im getting this error when I compile my server. First thing, here is a post of the compiler im using:

@echo off
color 0
title _____
javac *.java
pause

This is the error I get when compiling:

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
press any key to continue. . .

Any help is greatly appreciated, I have never had this problem before.

Read full topic
